name: Spring Shop
description:
Asalam o Alaikum Everyone😊

i am Arslan Akram from GameChef. This is our First Game Jam. We are happy to be able to Complete Spring Shop on time. We hope that you like it.😁

Available For Pc 

------------------☆

Story:

Spring Shop is a arming game where player plants sun flowers And stores them in his shop so that Shop will not run out of flowers and Customers will stay happy😅

Game Mechanics:😄

1.Plant seeds.

2.Water plants.

3.Collect flowers.

4.Refill water bar.

5.Refill seed bar.

6.Bee boosts plants after every few seconds.

7.Customer comes and takes flowers at certain time.

8.Flower Score is less than -10 game will restart.

------------------------☆

Keyboard Controls:

Movement:

☆W A S D

☆Space

Mouse Controls:

☆Collect Flower
